title: WBD vs Autodesk | SSE | Offer
content:
Education: Masters in CS from IIT
Years of Experience: 5Y+
Prior Experience: mid & large scale MNCs
Date of the Offer: Oct 2024

Company: WBD
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Pune, India
Salary: INR 35L
Relocation/Joining: None.
Signing Bonus: INR 3L
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 35L + ~ 5L = 40L.


Company: Autodesk
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Pune, India
Salary: INR 34L + 12% PF.
Relocation/Joining: NA
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: $60k/3year
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 10%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 34L + 4L (PF) + ~3L (Perf) + 16.9L RSU = ~57.9L

How's the culture at Autodesk Pune?

title: Twilio | L3 | Offer
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 7
Current TC: 32 LPA
Prior Experience: mid & large scale MNCs
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Twilio
Title/Level: L3
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 3700000
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: INR 400000
Stock bonus: $40K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 12.5%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 5100000


Please evaluate w.r.t. compensation offered. Also, any insights on company work culture, growth opportunities etc. would be really helpful.
